description.english: Researched 3 weapons to tier II in one round.
description.german: 3 Waffen bis mindestens Rang II in einer Runde erforscht
description.french: 3 armes montées au rang II en une manche
description.italian: Studiate 3 armi fino alla classe II in un turno
description.spanish: Has investigado 3 armas hasta el nivel II en una ronda
description.schinese: 一个回合把3种武器研究到二级
description.russian: 3 вида оружия изучены до ступени II за один раунд

description.english: Refine 60 Iron in one round.
description.german: 60 Eisen raffiniert
description.french: 60 unités de fer raffinées
description.italian: Raffinati 60 minerali di ferro
description.spanish: Has refinado 60 de hierro
description.schinese: 精炼60单位铁
description.russian: Переработано 60 единиц железа

description.english: Have Hyperdrive maxed.
description.german: Hypertriebwerk maximiert
description.french: Avoir l'hyperpropulseur au max
description.italian: Iperguida portata al massimo
description.spanish: Ten el hiperpropulsor al máximo
description.schinese: 将超时空跃迁强化到最高级
description.russian: Довести гипердвигатель до максимума

description.english: Kill 100 Mechanic intruders on the ship in one round.
description.german: 100 Mechanic Eindringlinge innerhalb einer Runde auf dem Schiff getötet
description.french: 100 intrus mechanics tués sur votre vaisseau en une manche
description.italian: Uccisi 100 intrusi Meccanici sulla navicella in un turno
description.spanish: Has matado a 100 intrusos mecánicos en la nave en una ronda
description.schinese: 一个回合杀掉100个入侵飞船的Mechanics
description.russian: 100 Mechanics, напавших на корабль, убито за один раунд

displayName.german: Wer nicht wagt, der nicht gewinnt
displayName.spanish: El que no arriesga no gana

description.english: Collect 1000 Biomass in one round.
description.german: Sammle 1000 Biomasse innerhalb einer Runde
description.french: Récupérer 1 000 unités de biomasse en une manche
description.italian: Colleziona almeno 1000 Biomasse in un turno
description.spanish: Recolecta 1000 de biomasa en una ronda
description.schinese: 在一回合中收集1000生物量
description.russian: Собрать 1000 единиц биомассы за один раунд

description.english: Die in space.
description.german: Stirb im Weltraum
description.french: Mourir dans l'espace
description.italian: Muori nello Spazio
description.spanish: Muere en el espacio
description.schinese: 死于太空中
description.russian: Умереть в космосе

description.english: Have at least 10 crew members sick when initiating a genesis.
description.german: Habe mindestens 10 kranke Crewmitglieder, wenn du eine Genesis beginnst
description.french: Lancer une genèse avec au moins 10 membres d'équipage malades
description.italian: Inizia una Genesis con almeno 10 membri dell’equipaggio malati
description.spanish: Ten al menos 10 tripulantes enfermos al iniciar una Génesis
description.schinese: 在开始Genesis时至少有10位生病的乘员
description.russian: Не менее 10 заболевших членов экипажа на момент начала генезиса

description.english: Have a Greenhouse with tier III plants fully grown in all planters.
description.german: Habe ein Treibhaus mit Rang-III-Pflanzen, die über alle Gefäße hinausgewachsen sind
description.french: Posséder une serre avec des plantes de rang III trop grandes dans tous les pots
description.italian: Possiedi una serra con piante di classe III troppo cresciute in tutti i vasi
description.spanish: Ten un invernadero con plantas de nivel III desarrolladas en todas las macetas
description.schinese: 拥有一个全部种植三级植物的温室
description.russian: Вырастите во всех кадках теплицы растения III ступени

description.english: Finish the tutorial level
description.german: Schließe das Tutorial-Level ab
description.french: Terminer le niveau didacticiel
description.italian: Completa il livello tutorial
description.spanish: Completa el nivel del tutorial
description.schinese: 完成教程关卡
description.russian: Завершить уровень обучения

description.english: Receive a pickup from a site.
description.german: Nimm etwas von einem Standort auf
description.french: Recevoir une récolte d'un site
description.italian: Effettua una raccolta da un sito
description.spanish: Recoge algo de un lugar
description.schinese: 从一座遗迹获得一件拾取物
description.russian: Получить предмет, подобранный с участка

description.english: Clone your first non human lifeform.
description.german: Klone deinen ersten nicht menschlichen Klon
description.french: Cloner votre premier clone non-humain
description.italian: Clona il tuo primo clone non umano
description.spanish: Clona a tu primer clon no humano
description.schinese: 进行首次非人类克隆
description.russian: Создать первого клона нечеловека

description.english: Build at least 100 modules to your ship in one round
description.german: Baue mindestens 100 Module innerhalb einer Runde
description.french: Construire au moins 100 modules en une manche
description.italian: Costruisci almeno 100 moduli in un turno
description.spanish: Construye al menos 100 módulos en una ronda
description.schinese: 一个回合至少建造100个模块
description.russian: Построить как минимум 100 модулей за один раунд

description.english: Use an alien ability.
description.german: Benutze eine Außerirdischenfähigkeit
description.french: Utiliser une compétence alien
description.italian: Usa un’abilità aliena
description.spanish: Usa una habilidad alienígena
description.schinese: 使用一项外星能力
description.russian: Использовать инопланетную способность

description.english: Research 3 clones to tier II in one round
description.german: 3 Klone bis mindestens Rang II in einer Runde erforscht

description.spanish: Has investigado 6 clones hasta el nivel III en una ronda
description.schinese: 一个回合把6种克隆研究到三级
description.russian: 6 клонов изучены до ступени III за один раунд

description.english: Research 6 weapons to tier III in one round
description.german: 6 Waffen bis mindestens Rang III in einer Runde erforscht
description.french: 6 armes montées au rang III en une manche
description.italian: Studiate 6 armi fino alla classe III in un turno
description.spanish: Has investigado 6 armas hasta el nivel III en una ronda
description.schinese: 一个回合把6种武器研究到三级
description.russian: 6 видов оружия изучены до ступени III за один раунд

description.english: Refine 60 Platinum in one round.
description.german: 60 Platin in einer Runde raffiniert
description.french: 60 unités de platine raffinées en une manche
description.italian: Raffinati 60 minerali di Platino in un turno
description.spanish: Has refinado 60 de platino en una ronda
description.schinese: 一个回合精炼60单位铂金
description.russian: 60 единиц платины переработано за один раунд

description.english: Kill 100 Framen intruders on the ship in one round.
description.german: Töte 100 Framen Eindringlinge innerhalb einer Runde
description.french: Tuer 100 intrus framens en une manche
description.italian: Uccidi 100 intrusi Framen in un turno
description.spanish: Mata a 100 intrusos Framen en una ronda
description.schinese: 一个回合杀掉100个入侵飞船的Framen
description.russian: Убить 100 атакующих Framen, напавших на корабль, за один раунд

description.english: Perform 100 expeditions in one round.
description.german: Führe 100 Expeditionen innerhalb einer Runde durch
description.french: Prendre part à 100 expéditions en une manche
description.italian: Esegui 100 spedizioni in un turno
description.spanish: Realiza 100 expediciones en una ronda
description.schinese: 一个回合中执行100次远征
description.russian: Принять участие в 100 экспедициях за один раунд

description.english: Heal a sick crew member in their crew cabin with the healing ability.
description.german: Heile ein krankes Crewmitglied in dessen Kabine mit einer Heilfähigkeit
description.french: Soigner un membre d'équipage malade dans sa cabine avec la compétence de soin
description.italian: Cura un membro dell’equipaggio malato nella sua cabina con l’abilità di guarigione
description.spanish: Cura a un tripulante enfermo en su camarote de tripulación con la habilidad de curación
description.schinese: 使用治疗技能治疗一名生病的乘员，要求在乘员的舱室内进行
description.russian: Вылечить больного члена команды в его каюте, используя исцеляющие способности

description.english: Research at least 3 diseases.
description.german: Erforsche mindestens 3 Krankheiten innerhalb einer Runde
description.french: Étudier au moins 3 maladies en une manche
description.italian: Studia almeno 3 malattie in un turno
description.spanish: Investiga al menos 3 enfermedades en una ronda
description.schinese: 在一回合中至少研究三种疾病
description.russian: Изучить по меньшей мере 3 болезни за один раунд

description.english: Initiate a genesis.
description.german: Beginne eine Genesis
description.french: Lancer une genèse
description.italian: Inizia una Genesis
description.spanish: Inicia una Génesis
description.schinese: 开始一次Genesis
description.russian: Запустить генезис

description.english: Have one clone of each species when initiating a genesis.
description.german: Habe einen Klon jeder Spezies, wenn du eine Genesis beginnst
description.french: Posséder un clone de chaque espèce en lançant une genèse
description.italian: Inizia una Genesis possedendo almeno un clone di ogni specie
description.spanish: Ten un clon de cada especie al iniciar una Génesis
description.schinese: 开始Genesis时拥有每一个物种的克隆
description.russian: Создать не менее одного клона каждого вида при запуске генезиса

description.english: Initiate a genesis where at least 20 aliens/eggs on board.
description.german: Beginne eine Genesis mit mindestens 20 Außerirdischen oder Eiern an Bord
description.french: Lancer une genèse avec au moins 20 aliens/œufs à bord
description.italian: Inizia una Genesis con almeno 20 alieni o uova a bordo
description.spanish: Inicia una Génesis con al menos 20 huevos o alienígenas a bordo
description.schinese: 开始Genesis时飞船上至少有20个外星人/卵
description.russian: Начать генезис, когда на корабле будет не менее 20 инопланетян или яиц

description.english: Complete a round where no crew member died on the journey.
description.german: Schließe eine Runde ab, ohne ein Crewmitglied zu verlieren
description.french: Terminer une manche sans perdre de membre d'équipage
description.italian: Completa un turno senza perdere alcun membro dell’equipaggio
description.spanish: Completa una ronda sin perder a ningún tripulante
description.schinese: 不损失任何一名乘员完成一个回合
description.russian: Завершить раунд, не потеряв ни одного члена экипажа

description.english: Unlock all corporations.
description.german: Schalte alle Unternehmen frei
description.french: Débloquer toutes les corporations
description.italian: Sblocca tutte le corporazioni
description.spanish: Desbloquea todas las corporaciones
description.schinese: 解锁所有公司
description.russian: Разблокировать все корпорации

description.english: Unlock all species.
description.german: Schalte alle Spezies frei
description.french: Débloquer toutes les espèces
description.italian: Sblocca tutte le specie
description.spanish: Desbloquea todas las especies
description.schinese: 解锁所有物种
description.russian: Разблокировать все виды

description.english: Unlock all artefacts
description.german: Schalte alle Artefakte frei
description.french: Débloquer tous les artefacts
description.italian: Sblocca tutti gli artefatti
description.spanish: Desbloquea todos los artefactos
description.schinese: 解锁所有人工制品
description.russian: Разблокировать все артефакты
